subject: Football (College)
BCS National Championship
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Having led Alabama to the title game three times, the coach Nick Saban has earned a statue — and the right to at least consider leaving. But statues have a way of becoming tarnished.
snippet: Having led Alabama to the title game three times, the coach Nick Saban has earned a statue — and the right to at least consider leaving. But statues have a way of becoming tarnished.
